about.title: About Index Tax & Financial Inc.
about.subtitle: 美國長越財務會計
about.desc: Index Tax & Financial Inc. (美國長越財務會計) is a full-service CPA and consulting firm dedicated to bridging the financial gap between the United States and global markets. Headquartered in the San Gabriel Valley, our firm is built on a foundation of "Big 4" accounting pedigree and Fortune 500 consultancy experience. We specialize in complex cross-border financial architecture, serving High-Net-Worth Individuals (HNWIs) and transnational enterprises navigating the intricacies of US tax law and business compliance.
